comments.author: Xi
comments.content:
I was absolutely shocked and repulsed when I read that FB comment too. So shocked that I actually had to read it twice to check that my blurry eyes weren't deciving me this morning.

You can't make such sweeping generalisation for a whole nation based on the action of a few individuals and it's in particular poor taste to bring it up when they're in crisis.

If we all held grudges like that, we'd be living in a world of perpetual war!

I feel so strongly about this that I'm going to jump in on that convo too.

I'm with TeamHeide! (Btw, when I saw him refer to a Heide, I thought it was a girl, then realised that it was in response to you!).

comments.author: Xi
comments.content:
Me again.

If there really was a god, there wouldn't have been a tsunami and we'd live in a perfect world where everyone's happy and there is no mould.

Water purification plants are fascinating. If I had a smartphone a couple of years ago, I'd check in at all the sewage treatment works, recycling centres and composting facilities I'd visited!
